00112 inline
00113 void
00114 scfx_string::resize( std::size_t i )
00115 {
00116     do {
00117         m_alloc *= 2;
00118     } while( i >= m_alloc );
00119 
00120     char* temp = new char[m_alloc];
00121 
00122     for( int j = 0; j < (int) m_len; ++ j ) {
00123         temp[j] = m_buffer[j];
00124     }
00125     temp[m_len] = 0;
00126 
00127     delete [] m_buffer;
00128     m_buffer = temp;
00129 }
